div.p:
Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos vndecimo die Januarij
Anno Domini et cetera septuagesimo secundo videlicet die Juridico post festum natalis Domini quo
die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum quorum
quilibet in amerciamento curie propter absenciam

Quo die Thomas de camera burgensis de Aberdene comparens in curia coram
ballivis protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu ii s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
Jacente ad caput vici castri veluti continetur in processu primj diei Ad quam ter
ram personaliter accedens nichil reperit distringibile super dictam anni terram ad
dictum annuum redditum recuperandum preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in
curia coram ballivis pro secundo die processus Testibus Andrea cummyn scissore
Johanne de torryleith burgensis huius burgi et philippo de Dunbrek sergeando

Eodem die comparens in curia coram Preposito et ballivis burgi Alexander trail
burgensis eiusdem protestatus fuit quod quicquid Andreas alani burgensis dicti
burgi auunculus suus fecerit seu protestatus fuit penes Reuocacionem adnullacionem
aut contradictionem illius compromissi facti inter ipsos non cederet eidem
alexandro in preiudicium Juris sui in futurum

Item eodem die Alexander frasar in fotino calumpniatus de iniusta perturbacione vex
acione et inquietacione Margaretee hervy sponse quondam Thome broysur'
burgensis huius burgi infra domum siue maneriem dicte margarete quam
calumpniam dictus alexander negauit vnde Assisa desuper electa et Jurata
decreuit et deliberauit quod dictus Alexander quitus erat ab omni perturbio
et Inquietacione dicte margrete vsque in hunc diem et de punctis in
sua querela contentis

Item dicto die Jacobus craik burgensis huius burgi plegius pro Alexandro
scot super quem Gilbertus de camera Inuenit plegium pro iniusta detencione
decem solidorum ab eodem pro primo die vocatus ad intrandum dictum alexandrum
responsurus prefato gilberto et Juri periturus super actione predicta Non comparuit
Et ideo precipitur sergeando et cetera

Item eodem die patricius Wilelmi filius et heres quondam Willelmi adamson burgensis
huius burgi comparens in curia cum suo prolocutore Angusio Johannis protestatus fuit pro
quodam annuo redditu quindecim solid' sibi annuatim debito et a longo tempore non
soluto de vna terra Jacente in le scule hil inter terram Jacobi crag ex parte orientali
et quandam terram vastam ex parte boreali ad quam terram personaliter accedens nichil
reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos presentauit
in curia coram ballivis testibus Johanne Wilson et patricio stiklaw burgensibus
dicti burgi cum Duncano straloch bedello burgi et hoc tanquam primo die processus

Item eodem die Johannes Wormot procurator et nomine procuratorio Johannis Wellis protestatus
fuit pro Jure proprietate et possessione cuiusdam terre Jacentis in vico de li greyn
inter terram Thome Keig ex australi parte et terram hered' thome cran ex boreali
parte et quod quicquid actum factum ve prosecutum fuerat penes huiusmodi terram
non cederet in preiudicium dicto Johanni Wellis quam ad Jus suum de eadem

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus ductis per dominum Dauid vaus capellanum et
procuratorem altaris beate marie magdalene infra b ecclesiam beati Nicholai de
aberdene super Recuperacione possessionis et proprietatis vnius terre Jacentis in vico
viridi inter terram thome Keig ex australi parte ab vna et terram hered'
thome cran ex parte boreali ex parte altra pro defectu solucionis cuiusdam
annuj redditus vndecim solidorum et octo d' annuatim debito dicto altari
beate marie magdalene et a longo tempore non soluti Vnde dictus dominus
Dauid nomine quo supra peciit a balliuis secundum formam suorum processuum precedencium
Juris et iusticie complementum Tunc curia deligenter avisata
decreuit et deliberavit quod dictus dominus Dauid dictam terram legitime
recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus xj s' et viij d' preno
tat' et hoc ex ore Wilelmi serra Judicatorum dicte curie pro Judicio
fuit datum teste curia

The same day the forsaid ser Dauid vaus in presence of the hail court
has gravntit frely resignit and our'gefin all his Richtis and cleme
of rycht that he has or may hafe eftir that yere and day be past
for him and his successouris chaplanis of Sanct mary magda
lenis altar in the parisch kirk of the burgh of Aberdene of the said land
recoverit be him processit of before quhilk land was vmquhile
Johne blindsel' burges of this burgh liand in the greyn til gilbert
murison burges of abirdene and til his ayris perpetualie payand to
the forsaid D ser Dauid and his successouris chaplanis of the forsaid
altar xj s' and viij d' yerly of annuel togiddre with the annual Runnyn
apon the said land b of tymes bygane vnpait to the said ser Davy

Item the forsaid gilbert murison has protestit in presence of the said
court that the process' that ser Dauid caus has folowit and optenit
of the forsaid land of vmquhile Johne blindsel' liand in the greyn quhilk
lande aw him yerly x s' of annuel that it turne him to na preiudice
anent his said annuel in tyme tocum

Decimo quinto die Januarii de consensu communis consilii pro tempore in pretorio quidem
Andreas ihonson faber factus fuit liber burgensis huius burgi
racione libertatis patris suj quondam burgensis dicti burgi Et soluerit preposito
v s' in alba bursa quos adhuc non acquisiuit ab eo quia pauper

Quo die Willelmus cryne in fotino et Adam browne cum suis consociis quj na
uigabant alias in naue magni Wormot in Angliam cum certis bonis thome
nortoune anglici protestacionem fecerunt in plena curia pro expensis suis
et costagiis sociorumque omni suorum de magno Wormot predicto quousque
dictus magnus satisfecerit eisdem de conductione et le furing sicut predictus
magnus Wormot vt asseruerunt promisit persoluere eisdem pro tunc dicta nauigacione
ad angliam et hoc nomine ipsorum ceterorumque sociorum suorum protestati sunt et cetera

Eodem die decretum est et deliberatum per certas personas iuratas quod Alexander
sanquhar soluet Willelmo swape pro quadraginta le wethy ferri
iii li' xvj s' et viii d' infra terminum Juris

div.head: Liniatores ordinati pro anno presenti
div.p:
Matheus fichat Dauid colison' Willelmus vocat Thomas de camera
Alexander blindsel gilbertus vaus Walterus anfrason' Dauid simson
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxj xxjijo die Januarij anno quo supra

quo
die Johannes de Dunde sutor adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis curie in vno
videlicet pro iniusta perturbacione et percussione megote manentis in vico furcarum
et in alio pro perturbacione vxoris thome molbuk et tenetur emendare partibus lesis

head.add: Da hill et lindesay le harald

div.p:
Eodem die in curia coram preposito et ballivis comparuerunt Thomas de camera
Alexander rede gilbertus vaus et gilbertus de camera arbitri electi
inter Dauid hil burgensis huius burgi actorem ab vna et lindesay harrold
defenden' partibus ab altra cum consensu vtriusque partis penes vnam barel
lam salmonum clamatam per dictum Dauid ab eodem lindesay harrold et Alexandro scrogs
plegio dicti lindesay pro huiusmodi barella qui quid arbitri mature aduisati decreuerunt
pronunciarunt dictum lindesay teneri et firmiter obligari predicto Dauid hil in prefata
barella salmonum de termino transacto et dictum alexandrum scrogs plegium per solucione dicte
barelle salmonum Inuenerunt et finaliter concluserunt

Vicesimo quinto die mensis Januarii anno et cetera lxxijo de consensu communis consilij Dun
canus smyth filius et heres apparens Wilelmi smytht aput pontem de bal
polgony ad instanciam Alexandri meignes ex eo quod desponsavit filiam quondam
magistri Roberti lichton' consanguineam dicti alexandri quam nunc affidauit factus fuit
liber burgensis et frater gilde huius burgi absque vllo denario soluendo ex
gracia prepositi et tocius consilj / qui quidem Duncanus solitum et debitum prestitit Juramentum

Sexto die mensis februarii anno supradicto Andreas scherar' prepositus de
aberdene et Dauid de Kyntor burgensis eiusdem deuenerunt plegij le
gales Dauidi meignes dicti burgi burgensis pro Johanne henrison in
fotino videlicet quod idem Johannes satisfaciet dicto Dauid meignes debitum
omne pi' per eundem vsque in hunc diem Dauidi meignes antedicto debito
in quam legitime probari poterit infra hinc et festum penthecostes proximo futuro
Et dictus Dauid meignes eodem die constituit Alexandrum meignes suum
procuratorem actorem factorem et deputatum specialem ad prosequendum legitime dictum
debitum per prefatum Johannem henrison Dauidi meignes debito ut predicitur / et
quoscumque alias summas et debita antedicto Dauidi constituti infra huc
burgum debit' sine confessat' et illas siue illa Recuperand' et leuand'
pro eisdem et si necesse fuerit distringend' et namand' cum vniuersis clausulis
aliis procuratorio necessariis in consideracionibus seu requisitis Ratum et gratum haben' et habiture et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per eosdem octauo die mensis supradicti

quo die gelis
molendinarius per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vnius fir
lote cum dimidio f' victualium et vnius instrumenti antecedente a pik cum vna sacca a Re
licta quondam Duncani allon et satisfaciet infra terminum Juris
In curia tenta per balliuos xjo die mensis februarij anno supra dicto

quo die
Andreas prat accusatus per balliuos de iniusta perturbacione et percussione
Cristiane smaly negavit calumpniam predictam submittendo se determinacioni
proborum assise / quj mature aduisati deliberarunt et decreuerunt dictum
andream in amerciamento curie adiudicari pro perturbacione dicte Cristiane et emendature
eidem sufficienter et cetera

The xj day of februar' before writin It is ordanit be the Aldirman and the commone' consel
that the for the offence that Androu lammynton' fleschar has done agane the bail
lies and specialy againnis Robert blindsel bailye in the tyme as ane / that gif
it sal happin him in tyme tocum tomak ony / sic offence or contempning againnis
othir Aldirman baillie or offisar' that he salbe punyst as law wil videlicet his
bigging and hous' tobe castyn downe and his person' tobe bannyst oute of
this burgh for a yer' and day

The xix day of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxii In presence of the Aldirman and hail
consel It is appoyntit and accordit betuix' Androw Kympty on theta part and
gilbert of chavmer on the tothir part In maner' and fourme as eftir folowis videlicet /
that the said gilbert of chavmer is bundin and oblist til pay til Androw Kympty
for his grwnde richt of that lande that was quhilum Johne Kymptyis
his faderis liand in the castel gate apon the southe syde of that ilk betuix'
the lande of Dauid meignes on the est half on the ta part / and the lande of
vmquhile Robert ihoneson' on the west syde on the tothir part / quhilk
lande and tenement the said Androw has optenit and gottin fra his eldast brothir
Thomas Kymdy as the lettres and evidencis made tharwpon' schawis and
proportis of the quhilkis the Copy is Act and vritin in this commowne buke at
the desire of the said gilbert of chavmer / quhilkis lettres and Instrument the
aldirman and consel Ratifijt and admittit suffisant in the tyme / the forsaid gilbert
sal pay and content to the said Androw Kympty as said is for his richt of the
said land thretty and fyve merkis of the vsuale money of Scotland at
thir termys eftir writin that is to say at fasternyevyn next eftir folow
and the date of this write fyve merkis / and at mydlentryn next thareftir
folowand ten pundis / and at paisch next thareftir folowand ten pundis
And failyeand of the payment of the said some' of xxxv merkis at the
dais and termys forwritin the said Androw sal hafe Regress' to the forsaid
lande / And to the fulfilling of the forsaid condicione / gilbert of chavmer
has resignit' the said lande in the handis of Johne the vaus ane of
the baillies tobe deliuerit frely agane to the forsaid Androw gif it failyes
of the payment as forsaid is et cetera

head.add: An apud ecclesiam de Inche foris

div.p:
Vicesimo die mensis februarii Anno Domini et cetera lxxiio quo die quidem Andreas aput ecclesiam de
Inche accusatus de foristallacione burgj per prepositum confessus est foristallacionem pellium et super hoc
posuit se in voluntate prepositi quare adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et quod de cetero non foristallabit
burgum sub pena et cetera

Die lune primo die mensis marcii anno supradicto Willelmus modan adiudicatur per assisam
iuratam satisfacere Wilelmo bissat xxxiiij de infra quindenam futuram

Curia balliuorum Burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem die Jouis quarto die mensis marcij
Anno supradicto /

quo die curia affirmata quidam Thomas martyne posuit
ipsum in voluntate balliuorum pro Iniusta occupacione artificii scissorum fratrum
gilde quam emendabit iuxta ordinacionem Prepositi et communis consilij
In curia legali tenta per balliuos octauo die marcii quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata

Alexander fynlawson carnifex cepit probare cum Alexandro forbes de pitsligo milite
tanquam vno probare et teste die crastina quod ipse exoneratus est de xxv s' penes
thomam ihonis et cetera

The ix day of marche the yer' of gode et cetera lxxij yeris In presence of the hale
Consale in the tolbuth of Abirdene the Aldirman perofferit to Willeam quelp anent
the tak at he clamis to hafe rycht or reson to of the north' wattir of Done
that he sall at his awyn wil tak and chese quhat personis at he desyris
within the toun' duelland vnsuspect thai beand sworne the grete athe to ken and decide gif he hafe
reson to that tak at he clamys or nocht and eftir thar' deposicionis and
determinacion til vprycht the forsaid Willeam g of all scathis sustenit be
hym giff it beis funden at he hafe rycht to the forsaid tak

head.add: Jo Durward frater gilde v marcas

div.p:
Die decimo marcii anno prescripto Johannes Durwart Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento et soluit preposito v marcas
Johanne Duncanson burgense et vicino dicti burgi plegio pro eodem quod habebit terram distringibilem
in burgo infra annum et diem et pro ceteris oneribus debitis supportandis /

The xj day of marche the yer' et cetera lxxii Robert of culan burges of this burgh in presence of
the Aldirman baillies and in a fensit court pronuncit and schew that he was merchand
as ane til the wif of quhilum William adamson nychtbour of the said burgh in the
waring and dispone of hir gudis beyonde the sey til hir vtilitee and proffite
eftir the decesse of his said husband / And thare in presence of the hail Court / he
perofferit til the said woman thare present that gif sche had nocht beyn content
and assithit of his compt and rekning anent the said intrometting and disposicione of
hir forsaid gudis til hir vse and proffite as said is /. that he was thare redy
in presence of the hail court todo til hir anent the said office and intrometting as law
waulde / Eftir the quhilk Reherse and peroffer' the said quhilum Wil adamsonis
wif grawntit hir fullely content payt and assithit of all compt Rekning
and payment betuix thame of all sik gudis as said is / of the quhilkis he
had disposicione in the tyme And has quitclemit and dischargit him tharof
in tyme tocum / And than the forsaid Robert of culan warnit and chargit hir / that
sche sulde defende and procede in the Consistory of aulde Aberdene tweching
the some' of twenty pundis g' of the quhilk he has folowit and persewit him
in the consistory law as ane of the merchandis and dispositour of the said quhilum
Wil adamsonis gudis sen the tym that sche had dischargit him as said is

Eodem die Donaldus rolland posuit ipsum in voluntate balliuorum pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi
Kemp in evaginacione cultelli contra eundem quare iniungitur eidem pro emenda quod soluet vnam libre cere
ad missam Sancti sanguinis

Dauid hil calumpniatus per ballivos de perturbacione iniusta lyndesay harald convictus
fuit per assisam pro eadem quare adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendaturus ad visum proborum

Vxor Alexandri stil carnificis in amerciamento per propriam confessionem pro iniusta fractione communis ordinis
in vendicione amigdal' libre de le feggis pro enormi precio et Rasingis similiter
Cristiana vxor Walteri meirnys, et le Gudy hukstar in the gastraw, quilibet in amerciamento pro causa supradicta

Alexander rolland in amerciamento per assisam pro iniusta perturbacione Wilelmi Kemp et emendabit eidem
et soluet ad emendam ad missam sancti sanguinis

Die xiijo marcij Cristinus litstar pro primo die legitime vocatus ad intrandum Jacobum nef
pro quo deuenit plegius ad calumpniam balliuorum pro perturbacione et percussione domini Willelmi
scot capellani Non comparuit nec dictum Jacobum intrauit / quare precipitur sergeando quod capiat
districtum viii s' ab eodem cristino / et dare eundem ad plegium si petatur premuniat'
dictum cristinum ad intrandum dictum Jacobum hodie ad quindenam

Eodem die in plena curia mariota mernach constituit Andream culan burgensem huius ville
suum procuratorem ad prosequendum Mariotam essy pro septem solidis super quibus dictus Andreas nomine
procuratorio extendit plegium in manu bedelli et cetera

The samen day in presence of the aldirman and consel Comperit William panton' of petmethen and ser
Johne of yet penitenciar' to the bischop of Aberdene / askand the deliuerence of the twa
barnys of Johne mathoson quhilum burges of this toune left and assignit to thame
be the said Johne mathison thare fadir in his liege powsty togiddre with the gudis
pertening to the said barnys and admittit tharto be my lord of aberdene videlicet the
eldast son' and ayr toremain with the said William of panton and the secunde son' next
the Are with ser Johne of yet togiddre with the gudis of thaim til thare vtilitee and
proffite And eftir mekle altricacione of langage betuix the askaris of the said bar
nys and thare gudis and Alexander rede spous' to the modir of thaim ane of the executouris
to thare fadir and intromettour with the barnys and thare gudis /. the forsaidis partiis
ordand toremove / the aldirman and consel diligently and ripely avisit has ordand
and biddyn' the saidis twa barnys be deliuerit to the saidis William and ser Johne
be Henry of Ruthirfurd ane of the baillies throu verteu of the assigna
cione and admission ganging before / furthwith and but delay / and as to the
deliuerence of thare gudis / the aldirman and consel has ordand the said partij
folowand togife in vrite to the said Alexander rede be the next monunday cum
viii dais samekle gudis as thai clame of reson' sulde fall and pertene to
thame that the said Alexander as ane of the intromittouris tharwith may be avisit
with the said write and clame of gudis agane the next mononday immediatly
thareftir folowand / and that day he toanswer' and mak sik deliuerence of
thai gudis as he sulde do be reson' at the sycht of the aldirman and consel for
saidis And in the meintyme the saidis William of panton and ser Johne ar
ordand and requirit tokepe the saidis barnys allanerly with thaim selfis and nocht
toput thame til anne vthiris vnto the said mononday cum xv dais for gude
caus' and specialy for the cuming of my lord of aberdene To the quhilk thai
hafe gravntit to kepe and todo as is before vritin in all thingis baith the
partiis et cetera

div.head: xiijo die marcii anno et cetera lxxijo
div.p:
Johannes Wormot in amerciamento curie convictus per assisam pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis chapman
vicini ville in verbo et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum

Thomas sadlar' conuictus est per assisam in duobus amerciamentis curie in vno videlicet pro perturbacione Egidij
molendinarij in evaginacione cultelli contra eundem et in alio pro perturbacione vxoris dicti egidij
et tenetur emendare eisdem de dampno
Item predictus Egidius et, vxor ipsius, ipsorum quilibet similiter in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta dicti Thome sadlar' et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio decimo quinto marcij anno predicto quo die
sectis vocatis et curia affirmata

Andreas culan procurator Mariote mernagh'
calumpniavit Mariotam essy nomine procuratorio de vij s' per dictam mariotam essy eedem
debitis super quibus alexander blindsele prelocutor partis defendentis peciit diem legalem
ad respondendum qui sibi conceditur per curiam hodie ad quindenam Et dictus alexander
blinsel nomine partis ree affirmauit eundem andream culan procuratorem legitimum pro memorata
muliere ipsum constituen' et cetera
